messages.content: I'm glad you have your kids, but have you seen Brooklyn 99 like the op stated? It's worth living for too.
Monero enthusiast here. Make me happy and call me a liar again.
Looks like this person just solved the world’s starvation problem. Get a Nobel Prize ready for them!
By all means, go for it. We'll all be much happier when you're not dragging us down anymore.
So happy for your strong stance and to help him on his way out of your life.
Ded game we should be happy we have a new hero
Glad he survived or it might have become a *dead*lift.
I've never seen [NAME] dad look this relaxed ever. :D
You need to recheck your science. A simple Google search will yield research articles showing a biological and genetic basis for being LGBT. Happy reading!
so glad we picked this guy up. was absolutely terrified when we played against him. dude was in the zone.
Keep going! Every day you stick with it is another victory you can cherish!
Now I know where to do stag party for my friend, finally.
I’m glad I’m not the only one who was pedantic enough to notice.
Well, at least you'll have plenty of company
I crave physical contact. I get irritable if I go too long without it, which conflicts with the fact that I also enjoy being alone.
I once went alert on N1 and killed 3 people.. 2 maf and a doc. Doc got resurrected later thankfully
They'd never give her a crown but it would be so good to see her back on my screen.
I am proud to be racist No one in real life will know this
Leaving [RELIGION] and planning to FINALLY live MY life to the fullest without white men in white shirt telling me what to do every second of my day!!
I recently got a job that I wanted so now I don't have to live paycheck to paycheck.
[NAME] is the gift we all deserve
I'm glad you have someone to help you out! Perhaps over time you'll find it easier.
nice to see that more special needs are out in the work force. go get em pal.
I will then be singing "The hills are alive with the sound of music."
Wow... I’m so glad that my dog is lazy like me.
me too, always smoke a cig with the joint, they are best friends
I'm so glad you have access to that trans group. You will make friends and be able to support each other.
Happy? Not really, but glad we can come to a conclusion to my offhand semi in jest reply.
Glad you came to your senses. Go feel uncomfortable about Lola bunny in Space Jam again.
